about_the_game:
Pirates Book

This Pirates-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Iconic ships, clothing and everything pirate-y!

(Swash)Buckle up and get ready to find some hidden treasure!

Contents

The Pirates book unlocks the following images:
  • Captain - 26x46
  • Cherry bomb - 38x45
  • Compass - 42x48
  • Treasure Chest - 68x63
  • Jolly Roger - 72x76
  • The Black Spot - 96x96
  • Fire! - 99x57
  • Aftermath - 100x150
  • Treasure Map - 105x106
  • Message in a Bottle - 120x80
  • Storm - 120x170
  • Parrot - 121x158
  • Skull and Cross - 129x122
  • Kraken - 177x122
  • Abandon Ship - 181x95
  • Tall Ship - 182x172
  • Skull Cave - 195x155
  • Dock - 200x230
  • Spyglass - 209x84
  • Flintlock - 243x138

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • Processor: Intel i3
